text: Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gata ni wa satsugai ni taisuru hōfuku ga sadame rareta. Jiyujin ni wa jiyujin, dorei ni wa dorei, fujin ni wa fujin to. Daga kare (kagai-sha) ni,(higaisha no) kyōdai kara keigen no mōshide ga atta baai wa,(kagai-sha wa) seii o motte teichō ni benshō shi nasai. Kore wa anata gata e no nushi kara no (hōfuku no) kanwadeari, jihidearu. Sorede kongo kore ni ihan suru mono wa, itamashī chōbatsu o ukerudearou
